Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO ENERGY AND TELECOMMUNICATIONS

Title: Relates to the construction of geothermal energy generation facilities
Summary: Relates to the construction of new geothermal, dry steam, flash steam, and binary cycle plant facilities in New York state.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the energy law, in relation to the creation of geothermal energy generation facilities in New York state
